instructions.name: initialize
instructions.description: Initialize the Loop Protocol - creates config, OXO mint, bonding curve, treasury

instructions.name: create_loop
instructions.description: Create a new geographic Loop (ZIP code or airport)

instructions.name: stake_user
instructions.description: Stake USDC into a Loop's stacking pool

instructions.name: buy_oxo
instructions.description: Buy OXO tokens via bonding curve using yield

instructions.name: claim_vested_oxo
instructions.description: Claim OXO after vesting period completes
